publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5423 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Criminal Proceedings etc. (Reform) (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Criminal Proceedings etc. (Reform) (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage in the morning and afternoon being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 3: 50 minutes Groups 4 to 8 : 1 hour 45 minutes Group 9: 2 hours 5 minutes Groups 10 to 11: 2 hours 55 minutes Groups 12 to 15: 3 hours 25 minutes. Supported by: George Lyon*
